meanings.sent1: The soakers in the kitchen always make sure the dishes are clean.
meanings.sent2: The soakers at the car wash work hard to scrub every vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The soakers in the laundry room were known for their thoroughness in washing clothes.
meanings.sent4: She was a soaker of knowledge, always eager to learn new things.
meanings.sent5: The soakers in the garden carefully watered each plant to help them grow.

meanings.definition: A piece of cloth or material used to absorb liquid.
meanings.sent1: The soakers on the spill quickly absorbed the water from the floor.
meanings.sent2: She used the soakers to clean up the mess on the table.
meanings.sent3: The soakers on the sponge made cleaning up the juice spill easier.
meanings.sent4: The soakers on the towel soaked up the spilled milk in no time.
meanings.sent5: The soakers on the rag were perfect for wiping down the counters.

meanings.definition: A type of footwear designed to keep feet dry in wet conditions.
meanings.sent1: He put on his soakers before heading out into the rain.
meanings.sent2: The soakers kept her feet warm and dry during the hike.
meanings.sent3: The soakers were her favorite shoes to wear on rainy days.
meanings.sent4: His soakers were like a shield against the puddles on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: She loved the bright color of her soakers that brightened up gloomy days.
